Title: Berlin (No. 8)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), John Eisendrath, Jon Bokenkamp
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Liz refuses to work with Red after discovering the truth about the death of her father. Seeking to make amends and force Liz to see him, Red brings the FBI a case they can't ignore. ...
